"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c6acb06368726528660300#post_54c6acb06368726528660300
Now that you're done with Gurren lagann, There are two Robot anime from Studio Gainax left to check out.

"Gunbuster":http://kissanime.com/Anime/Gunbuster

"And Diebuster":http://kissanime.com/Anime/Gunbuster-2 (Also known as Gunbuster 2)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c6b21e63687247172a0100#post_54c6b21e63687247172a0100
They're a lot shorter than their other two works. (Only 6 episodes each.)

But they're still worth checking out.

Gunbuster is the anime that established Gainax as a force to be reckoned with. And Diebuster is a Spiritual successor to Gunbuster.

topics.body:
I have a dumb question; why do people ship Palutina and Lucina?  I think it's adorable, but I haven't played the latest smash so I don't get the reference.


Also on the topic:
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/903/445/860.gif!


And just to make this post even more gay (in a non-slanderous way but in a joking manner that is well aware of the negative connotation by making fun of the negative connotation sort of humor way) here's some good news on the gay marriage front: gay marriage is about to be legalized in Alabama; also due to the court's scheduling by June anywhere from 41 to 50 states will have legalized gay marriage.  Even if the supreme court rules against gay marriage only the eight circuit will remain and gay marriage will still be legal in the states that have ruled in favor.

Tl:dr; by June gay marriage will be legal in anywhere from 41 to 50 states in the usa.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
